clinical_study.brief_title: Tailored Internet-administrated Treatment of Panic Symptoms - A Randomised Controlled Trial
clinical_study.official_title: Tailored Internet-administrated Treatment of Panic Symptoms - A Randomised Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether tailored internet-administrated CBT is a feasible approach in the treatment of panic symptoms and comorbid anxiety and depressive symptoms.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks pre treatment, two weeks post treatment, six months and 12 months post treatment
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in panic symptoms two weeks post treatment, at six months and at 12 months post treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical Outcome in Routine Evaluation - Outcome Measure (CORE-OM)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks pre treatment, two weeks post treatment, six months and 12 months post treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in anxiety and depressive symptoms two weeks post treatment, at six months and at 12 months post treatment.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks pre treatment, two weeks post treatment, six months and 12 months post treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in anxiety symptoms two weeks post treatment, at six months and at 12 months post treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Montgomery Åsberg Depression Rating Scale-Self Rated (MADRS-S)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks pre treatment, two weeks post treatment, six months and 12 months post treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in depressive symptoms two weeks post treatment, at six months and at 12 months post treatment.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks pre treatment, two weeks post treatment, six months and 12 months post treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in quality of life statements two weeks post treatment, at six months and at 12 months post treatment.

intervention.description: This intervention contains 6-8 text-based self-help modules in which 4 modules are fixed (the first three and the last) and the rest are "prescribed following the diagnostic telephone interview. These modules contain material on panic disorder, social phobia, stress management, assertiveness training, concentration, relaxation among other things.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Be between the ages of 18-30 years old or 31-46 years old
- Have reoccurring panic attacks
Exclusion Criteria:
- Suicide prone
- Alcohol addiction
- PTSD
- OCD
- Ongoing psychological treatment
